verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> that came to Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> against the Philistines <WH6430>, before that Pharaoh <WH6547> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> Gaza <WH5804>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Behold, waters <WH4325> rise up <WH5927> <WH8802> out of the north <WH6828>, and shall be an overflowing <WH7857> <WH8802> flood <WH5158>, and shall overflow <WH7857> <WH8799> the land <WH776>, and all that is therein <WH4393>; the city <WH5892>, and them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein: then the men <WH120> shall cry <WH2199> <WH8804>, and all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> shall howl <WH3213> <WH8689>.

At the noise <WH6963> of the stamping <WH8161> of the hoofs <WH6541> of his strong <WH47> horses, at the rushing <WH7494> of his chariots <WH7393>, and at the rumbling <WH1995> of his wheels <WH1534>, the fathers <WH1> shall not look back <WH6437> <WH8689> to their children <WH1121> for feebleness <WH7510> of hands <WH3027>;

Because of the day <WH3117> that cometh <WH935> <WH8802> to spoil <WH7703> <WH8800> all the Philistines <WH6430>, and to cut off <WH3772> <WH8687> from Tyrus <WH6865> and Zidon <WH6721> every helper <WH5826> <WH8802> that remaineth <WH8300>: for the YY <WH3068> will spoil <WH7703> <WH8802> the Philistines <WH6430>, the remnant <WH7611> of the country <WH339> of Caphtor <WH3731>.

Baldness <WH7144> is come <WH935> <WH8804> upon Gaza <WH5804>; Ashkelon <WH831> is cut off <WH1820> <WH8738> with the remnant <WH7611> of their valley <WH6010>: how long wilt thou cut <WH1413> <WH8704> thyself?

O <WH1945> thou sword <WH2719> of the YY <WH3068>, how long will it be ere <WH3808> thou be quiet <WH8252> <WH8799>? put up <WH622> <WH8734> thyself into thy scabbard <WH8593>, rest <WH7280> <WH8734>, and be still <WH1826> <WH8798>.

How can it be quiet <WH8252> <WH8799>, seeing the YY <WH3068> hath given it a charge <WH6680> <WH8765> against Ashkelon <WH831>, and against the sea <WH3220> shore <WH2348>? there hath he appointed <WH3259> <WH8804> it.
